Posts.Content: scarlettohred wrote: Just wondering if anyone else has noticed joint pain in the legs, hips and fingers.. I am about 12 weeks post chemo and I was fine until about 5 weeks ago.  When I get out of bed it's like I am 100 years old. I feel like I have walked for miles in high heels but I haven't.  Dx 10/6/2009, DCIS, 2cm, Stage IIA, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Joint pain after chemo scarlettohred scarlettohred
